blood_plasma_cure: Blood plasma is a cure, life and a new beginning
help_us_collect: Help us collect the largest amount of blood plasma so that we can help all of our patients.
when_you_donate: When you donate plasma, you will benefit a sick person by providing the appropriate treatment for him
don't_lose_time:
don't lose the time to now when you have to go to donation place

by using this app you will be able to donate and book an appointment in all places
did_not_receive: If you didn't receive a code!
not_valid_phone: It is not a valid phone number
not_valid_email: It is not a valid email address
not_valid_pass: It is not a valid password
email_in_use: This email is already in use
password_length: Password must contain at least 8 characters
write_same_password: Write the same password to confirm
most_sick_people: Most Sick People Need Blood Plasma
donate_and_help: Donate and help them treat many diseases that threaten their lives.
plasma_main_source: Plasma is the main source for the manufacture of derivatives such as clotting factors, which is the only treatment for patients with chronic bleeding, such as "hemophilia".
blood_plasma_made: Blood plasma is made from proteins that are important for the treatment of inflammatory patients, liver cancers and kidney patients.
plasma_consists: Plasma consists of 92% water and 8% blood plasma proteins.
doing_analysis: * Doing the analysis of acquired immunodeficiency (AIDS) and syphilis on a regular basis.
providing_safe_treatment: * Providing safe treatment and avoiding complications that occur as a result of the lack of necessary treatment such as joint obstruction for bleeding patients, avoiding cirrhosis and kidney failure for chronic viral hepatitis patients.
permissible_age: The Permissible Age Ranges From 18 To 60.
donor_diabetes: If the donor has diabetes, he should not take insulin.
suffer_health_problems: He does not suffer from any health problems in the heart, liver, kidneys or thyroid gland.
donor_examined_carefully: The donor is examined and carefully examined to ensure that his health condition is suitable for plasma donation
center1_name: Dr. Ehab Serag El Din Center for Blood Transfusion and Plasma Collection Services
center2_name: The Regional Center for Blood Transfusion in Abbasiya
center2_address: 5A, Sikka Al-Baida Street - in front of the Passports and Immigration Authority - Abbasiya
center3_name: Regional Center for Blood Transfusion in Dar El-Salam
center3_address: 987 Corniche El-Nile Street, next to Dar El-Salaam Tumor Hospital, next to the King Saleh Bridge
center4_address: Abdel Qader Abu Akada Square inside the Alexandria Ambulance Facility in front of the stadium
center5_address: Hafez Wahbi Street, behind the educational buildings in front of the rubber factory
center6_address: Nile Corniche, next to Minya Cancer Center
banner_nearest_center_msg: We Have Detected The Nearest Center Based On Your Current Location
app_purpose: The app purpose is to facilitate the donation process between users and the head organization.
we_provide: We provide you with all information you need for donation and the right steps to follow to donate.
more_info: For more info about the application,donation or organization, visit:
dear_donor:
Dear donor...

 Before donating, you will be asked several personal and sensitive questions, 
and we hope not to embarrass you.
 Your honest answers will ensure that the blood transfusion is as safe as possible.
 All information you provide will be treated confidentially.
q2: Do you weigh more than 50 Kg?
q3: Is your blood pressure level regular?
q4: Do you suffer from Heart problems?
q5: Do you suffer from Liver problems?
q6: Do you suffer from Kidney problems?
q7: Do you suffer from Thyroid problems?
q9: Have you received the CoronaVirus vaccine?
q10: Have you had surgery in the last 6 months?
q11: Have you ever donated blood or one of its derivatives during the past three months?
q12: During the past 14 days, did you have any symptoms of the emerging corona virus?
q13: During the past 14 days, have you had contact with a patient infected with the emerging corona virus?
q14: Have you undergone any dental treatment (filling, extraction, root treatment, cleaning, whitening)?
q15: Do you live with someone who has hepatitis?
taking_medication: If you are taking any medication, please let us know
centers_available: All Centers Are Available 14 Hours Daily
go_check_result: Go check your medical test results before donation
tell_us_opinion: Tell us your opinion about the donation process
in_the_interest: In the interest of the Ministry of Health to provide the best service to donors, answer the following:
rating_service_general: What is your rating for the service you received at the center in general?
assessment_performance: What is your assessment of the performance of the service in terms of:
availability: 2- Availability of information and donor awareness?
level_medical_safety: 3- The level of medical safety and sterilization?
regular_donor: Would you like to be a regular donor?
something_went_wrong_link: Something Went Wrong While Opening The Link.Try Again Or Check Your Internet Connection
